doc.title: It's Not You, It's Me
doc.plot: Takes place over one day in the seaside town of Worthing. (UK) Rose is a young woman with a tangled love life. After ecstatically agreeing to marry Henry, she charges around town telling a succession of other boyfriends that their relationship is over. Each time she learns another unpalatable truth about herself. Until finally she makes it to the Italian restuarant where Henry and both sets of parents are waiting...
